column5: Beautiful fish, congrat's!

Hey Ron  I only catch big fish near green bouys not red bouys!!! I photo shopped the bouy red in the pike photo;-) I am afraid people are going to start photoshopping the pictures to get the bouy numbers off of them! ;-)  D
That is a hog for sure Darren!!!
That might be the largest smallie I've seen this year. Congrats to you!

Headed out to simcoe today to see if we could hook into some of the monster smallies that have been showing themselves on the board lately. Lots of BIG storms all around us. Nothing on tubes so we decide3d to troll some breaklines in 25-30 feet of water with crawfish pasttern DT Rapalas. Caught one small fish then moved to a new break line and hooked this baby. It stayed deep the whole time and i thought I had northen until it did a cartwheel 4 feet clear of the water! Bounced the scales between 5.5 nd 5.9lbs. This is the largest smallie I have ever put on a scale and just may be my PB.     Then got chased by some BIG storms!!!!   Darren
That is a MONSTER!!!  Way to go Bucktail, awesome  Joey
....Yep, that's a "HOG!".
What a smallie!
Well done bucktail!
WOW....HUGE SMALLIE !!!!!!! well done,congrats .  ..man those simcoe smallies just keep getting bigger all the time....cheers
Great smallie.Congrats on the p.b.
i'm jealous! i need to head out this weekend!! it is a must! possibly my last for this year on the boat.
wow! wtg on that one
Well,well,well, thats a sweet hog there bud.  Congrats.  I,ll be looking for my persoanl best aswell come the AM.  Good job.  I,ll be tube,n for mine.
Moby Dick Bass WTG what a beauty  MTP
Great googlie mooglie thats a big fish.  Way to go !
Beauty Bass Bucktail!!
A lot of fun when you get them that size! Nice fish!
Holy moly!  What a fish! Great catch and great pic!
Congrats on the sweet smallie, there is nothing better.
Beauty, WTG...
thats a hawg!
nice smallie
What is it with you and marker bouys??? ( monster pike comes to mind)....   Good on ya bud, nice smallie!
Congrats on the personal best! Lots of big smallies coming from Simcoe these days.  Very nice fish,  ehg
WOW! What an amazing fish!!! I wonder if you can troll in tournaments?lol
yea!!! Nice hog man. Congrats.
Nice Smallie, that is a HORSE will hopefully hook into one before the end of the season
